name: Mythic Prelude Demo
description:
Keep an eye on the Kickstarter here!
          https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/mythicprelude/mythic-prelude

On a night with the sound of rain pelting the roof with the intermittent roars of thunder, Simon Gram awakens in a home that he has never seen that houses furniture larger than practical for a person of normal size, and dangers unknown. All he finds are the journals of Tlaloc, a hero that he had always admired that towered above all. From his slumber, he finds a sword, a talking raven, and must fight to survive the night, and unravel the mystery of why he's here.

Mythic Prelude is an action-adventure title inspired by Action-Adventure titles from the 90s. This demo is designed as a stand-alone freeware product for itch.io and for our Kickstarter!

Lead: Dmitri Lowell
Music: The Noble Demon
Promotional Artwork: Kazumi Takashi
Tileset: Le Pixelists
Boss and IntroRoom Tileset: Jason Perry

(Remainder of credits on the Kickstarter page)
